document.heading: Bloomingdale and Ledroit Park Backflow Preventer and Sandbag Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-292, the “Bloomingdale and Ledroit Park Backflow Preventer and Sandbag Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-936. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Feb. 4, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-660 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-292 became effective on Apr. 27, 2013.
